original_text: In the other regions of the kingdom, the Jews came together on the 13th day of Adar. They did that to protect themselves against their enemies. They killed 75,000 of their enemies. But they did not take their enemies' things for themselves. Then, on the 14th day of Adar, the Jews in the regions rested. They ate feasts and they were very happy.
korean_text: 아달월 십삼일에 그 일을 행하였고 십사일에 쉬며 그 날에 잔치를 베풀어 즐겼고

sentences.original_text: In the other regions of the kingdom,
the Jews came together on the 13th day of Adar.
They did that to protect themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 보호하기 위해 그렇게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: But they did not take their enemies' things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 적들의 것을 가져가지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then, on the 14th day of Adar,
the Jews in the regions rested.
